Added_Other.purpose: Improves the organization of social interactions, making it easier for players to find friends and join games.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppEdpBackendV2HydrateLegacyIxp4
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the backend system for handling legacy data.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the stability and performance of older features for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppFixSearchTextBoxWidth
Added_Other.mechanism: Adjusts the width of the search text box in Lua applications.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by making it easier to see and enter search terms.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppRecommendedGamesCollectionCarousel
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a new carousel feature for displaying recommended games in the app.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to discover new games they might enjoy, enhancing engagement.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOnTileHoverWithHiddenMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Displays age ratings alongside play buttons when hovering over game tiles.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps players quickly see if a game is appropriate for their age before playing.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppSupportEmptyStringFooterMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables support for empty string metadata in Lua applications.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows developers to create apps without needing to fill in all metadata fields, simplifying the development process.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances the Luau scripting language by checking for occurrences during code commits.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers catch errors early, leading to smoother gameplay and fewer bugs.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves how the Luau scripting language handles data distribution in complex shapes.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances performance and accuracy in game scripting, leading to smoother gameplay.

Added_Other.name: FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation
Added_Other.mechanism: Moves the display of empty results to a new foundational system for better performance.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the user experience by providing clearer feedback when there are no results.

Added_Other.name: FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Restricts modal pop-ups to only visible UI frames.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances user experience by preventing unwanted pop-ups when frames are not visible.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows text alignment information to be passed along in the staging environment.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances text layout and alignment, making it easier for players to read and interact with text elements.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2
Added_Other.mechanism: Collects performance data using an updated telemetry system.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers optimize games, leading to smoother gameplay for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousWake
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves the handling of unnecessary wake events in performance telemetry.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures more accurate performance tracking, leading to a smoother gameplay experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances the tracking of place version history for better management.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows players to access and revert to previous versions of a game easily.

Added_Other.name: FFlagProfilePlatformEnableChipSocialRow_v6_IXP
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables a new social feature on user profiles.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows players to easily see and connect with friends on their profiles.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReCacheIconsOnThemeChange
Added_Other.mechanism: Refreshes icon caches when the theme changes.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players see updated icons that match the current theme, improving visual consistency.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes how the focus state of the top navigation bar is managed.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves navigation efficiency and accessibility for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the shortcut option to leave a game from the leave confirmation dialog.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents accidental game exits, enhancing user experience and retention.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnConfirmation
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the shortcut option to respawn from the confirmation dialog.
Added_Other.purpose: Players must confirm their choice to respawn, preventing accidental respawns.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionField
Added_Other.mechanism: Adds a feature that simulates sound absorption in game environments.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances audio realism, making sound effects more immersive.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionFieldFileFormat
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a new file format for handling sound reverb absorption settings.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves audio quality in games by allowing more precise control over sound effects.

Added_Other.name: FFlagSelfieConsentDialogDontUsePortal
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes the way the selfie consent dialog is displayed, avoiding the use of a portal.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides a smoother experience for players when consenting to take selfies without unnecessary interruptions.

Added_Other.name: FFlagSelfieConsentDontMountUnused
Added_Other.mechanism: Prevents unnecessary mounting of unused selfie consent features.
Added_Other.purpose: Streamlines the selfie feature for a better user experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagUnsyncBreakpointsInClonedScripts
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows breakpoints in scripts to remain active even when scripts are cloned.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances debugging by letting developers test cloned scripts without losing breakpoints.

Added_Other.name: FFlagUpdateViewportOnUse3DPanelsChanged

Added_Other.purpose: Improves video quality and reduces lag during playback for players.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagAXSavePreviousPageFromQuickMenu

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagCommunicationsFixLastInputMode

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagEnableAutomaticGainControlForAudioDeviceInput

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagEnableNoiseReductionForAudioDeviceInput
